description:
def fetch_crl(self, context, project_id):
        """Get crl for a project"""
-       return crypto.fetch_ca(project_id)
+       return crypto.fetch_crl(project_id)
title: cert/manager.py not using crypto.fetch_crl

comments.content:
def fetch_crl(self, context, project_id):
        """Get crl for a project"""
-       return crypto.fetch_ca(project_id)
+       return crypto.fetch_crl(project_id)
